callbackIsAuthorized(bytes32,bytes,(byte.details: A (imageId, jounral) pair should be valid, and the respective callback authorized, if     and only if the journal is the result of the correct execution of the zkVM guest.

invokeCallback(((bytes,bytes32),address,.details: This function is usually called by the Bonsai Relay. This function reverts if the callback fails.

invokeCallbacks(((bytes,bytes32),address.details: This function is usually called by the Bonsai Relay. Note that this function does not     revert when one of the inner callbacks reverts.

returns.invocationResults: a list of booleans indicated if the calldata succeeded or failed.

requestCallback(bytes32,bytes,address,by.details: This function will usually be called be the Bonsai user's application contract, and     will log an event that the Bonsai Relay will detect and respond to.

callbackIsAuthorized(bytes32,bytes,(byte.notice: Determines if the given athorization is valid for the image ID and journal.

invokeCallback(((bytes,bytes32),address,.notice: Submit a single callback, authorized by an attached SNARK proof.

invokeCallbacks(((bytes,bytes32),address.notice: Submit a batch of callbacks, authorized by an attached SNARK proof.

requestCallback(bytes32,bytes,address,by.notice: Submit request to receive a callback.
